a.style: font-family:'Playfair Display', Georgia, 'Times New Roman', 'Liberation Serif', serif

text.tspan: Change in per capita COâ‚‚ emissions and GDP

Consumption-based emissions
include those from
fossil fuels and industry
. Land-use change emissions are not
included. GDP per capita is adjusted for inflation and for differences in living costs between countries.
Data source: Eurostat, OECD, and World Bank (2025); Global Carbon Budget (2024); Population based on various sources (2024)

Note: GDP per capita is expressed in
international-$
at 2021 prices.
